title: Making multicultural Australia: a multimedia documentary (PC & MAC)
creator_contributor_role: New South Wales. Board of Studies. Interactive Design Group, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Ethnic groups
description: Multiculturalism can mean many different things - these CD-ROMs allow you to explore many ideas and hear people from many different perscpectives putting their points of view. View a documenatry, take part in a debate, see a festival of multicultural arts, explore the "Harvest of Endurance" history scroll and read more than 2,500 pages of printable reports, documents and newspaper articles.
